Metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1029 affecting package puppet for versions less than 7.34.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2015-1029 affecting package puppet for versions less than 7.34.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package puppet is earlier than 7.34.0-1, affected by CVE-2015-1029
